menu.downloadApp: Download desktop app to enable custom font function

description.addBoardDesc: Click me! Add an enhanced Excalidraw board right now.
description.giveAStarDesc: Please git a star if Revezone is helpful to you.
description.systemSettingDesc: Custom fonts in Revezone board in the system setting.

welcome.productDesc: A new way to use Excalidraw. A lightweight productivity tool to build your second brain that integrates enhanced Excalidraw whiteboard and Notion-like note-taking features. Local-first and block-based.
welcome.operationTip: This is an empty page. Please add or select a file first in the left sidebar.
welcome.operationDetailDesc: Click the icons in left sidebar operation toolbar to add a board/note/folder.
welcome.onlineTry: This is an online trial version which only supports basic functions.
welcome.downloadApp: Download desktop app to enable full function.

links.title: Links
links.github: Official Github (Give a star if Revezone is helpful to you please)

publicBeta.title: Public Beta Notice
publicBeta.description: Revezone is currently in a public beta, there may still be a few bugs in the product. Please make sure to backup your important data. Please submit a github issue or concat my twitter if you have any questions or suggestions.

customFont.onlineVersionTip: Customing font not supports in online version, please download the desktop app
customFont.fontFirstLoadTip: Note: After the font is loaded for the first time, the application needs to be restarted for the font to take effect within the whiteboard.
